title: Sadhayai Meeri Song Lyrics Santhosh Narayanan
stanzas:
Nira maayangal
sila kaayangal ulle
edhu theebangal
edhu saabangal ingae

idhu hormone-gal
idum kolangal ulle
vidhi yaarukkum
vandhu sodhikkum
idhu thavaralla iyalbendru
unarndhaale muppaalinge

sadhayai meeri idhayam paarkum
manidham engum illaiyaa
mandhai keeri thiruthi paarka
idhu pizhaiyin pillaiyaa

ivargal paalai padaikkum
podhu kadavul paniyil illaiyaa
padaitha paavi kodutha vesham
ulagil medai illaiyaa

parandhu poga ulagam vendaam
ennum bothum thollaiyaa
irundhu vazha udaigal podhum
ada adhizhum ellaiyaa

idhu hormone-gal
idum kolangal ulle
idharkenindha vali
kaayangal ingae

ivai paavangal
ena oor sollum indre
vidhi yaarukkum
vandhu sodhikkum
idhu thavaralla iyalbendru
unarndhaale muppaalinge

sadhayai meeri idhayam paarkum
manidham engum illaiyaa
mandhai keeri thiruthi paarka
idhu pizhaiyin pillaiyaa

ivargal paalai padaikkum
podhu kadavul paniyil illaiyaa
padaitha paavi kodutha vesham
ulagil medai illaiyaa

parandhu poga ulagam vendaam
engum bothum thollaiyaa
kidandhu vazha udaigal podhum
ada adhizhum ellaiyaa

kaalam niyaayak koondile
nammai thallum inipari
ivargal kaigal kattinaal
adhuve adhuve sovukkadi

manidhare
evarum manidhare
avargal paalai avargal solla
sakkarai mattum
kalappom naam
